data.title: What Does Compilation Means?
data.text:
Page content loaded

User profile for user: Chris CA

User level: Level 10

82,440 points

A compilation is an album by a bunch of differnt artists such as "Now That What I Call Music" series or sometimes a "Greatest Hits" album.

It can also be used if an artist has an album with a bunch of different guest artists.

Link

User profile for user: varjak paw

User level: Level 10

170,218 points

It stops iTunes from listing each track as a separate album due to having different artists, and will show it only as a single album in the Compilations when you have the Browser turned on.

Link

User profile for user: Chris CA

User level: Level 10

82,440 points

It will move it into Compilations under Artists.

Link

User profile for user: Chris CA

User level: Level 10

82,440 points

If you want to.

If it's marked as a compilation, it will keep from having an artist listed multiple times such as;

Santana

Santana featuring Dave Matthews

Santana featuring Everlast

Santana featuring Rob Thomas

Santana featuring Lauren Hill

Santana featuring Eric Clapton

and on and on.

Link

User profile for user: varjak paw

User level: Level 10

170,218 points

It's up to you, but if you really mean every album, then every album would be listed under "Compilations" and you wouldn't see any albums listed by artist. Only for those albums where there are multiple artists is Compilations useful, in my opinion.

Link

User profile for user: Chris CA

User level: Level 10

82,440 points

On songs with a "Featured/Guest" artist and it is a "normal" album, I move the guest artist name to the song title and uncheck the album as a compilation.

"Smooth" - Santana featuring Rob Thomas

becomes

"Smooth featuring Rob Thomas" - Santana

This way the artist shows up as only Santana.

Link

User profile for user: varjak paw

User level: Level 10

170,218 points

Use of the "Album Artist" field can also help in situations where there are multiple artists. See:

http://www.macosxhints.com/article.php?story=200609140956019

Regards.

Link

User profile for user: Chris CA

User level: Level 10

82,440 points

how and when will it show in my ipod touch then?

Under Albums or Artists > Compilations.

Link
